channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: What polls show about Americansâ€™ views on childhood vaccine mandates
item.description: Most Americans say kids should be vaccinated to attend school. But as Florida plans to become the first state to eliminate childhood vaccine mandates, U.S. adults are also less likely to think these immunizations are important than they were several decades ago.

item.title: Gregory Bovino, head of Los Angeles campaign, shows how immigration agents rack up arrests
Where states stand in the battle for partisan advantage in US House redistricting maps
